featuredCase.title: From Novice to Full-Stack Developer in 6 Months
featuredCase.description: Alex had zero coding experience but wanted to switch careers. Using Goalspace's structured learning paths and AI mentorship, he went from complete beginner to landing a junior developer role in just 6 months.
